task.title: Banana Nut Bread For Mom
task.shortdesc: For this recipe, Mom will need the follwing:

taskbody.context: 1 ½ cups whole wheat flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 4 medium size ripe bananas mashed, ½ cup sugar, 1 large egg, 2 tablespoons canola oil, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, ½ cup chopped walnuts, toasted, cooking spray.

step.cmd: Stir together the flour, baking soda, baking powder and cinnamon in a large bowl
Add in the bananas, sugar, egg and canola oil and stir until batter is smooth and thick
Pour into a 9x5 inch pan after coating it with cooking spray
Bake at 350 degrees for 55 minutes or until a wooden toothpick inserted in the middle reveals no residue
